name: Roger Hall
text: Both photos below were taken on the new Google 10 Pro just minutes apart and unedited (except for the white dot in the middle of the first one) to depict the location of the second picture. The first picture with no zoom and the second with full zoom of the house a mile away. Best cell phone camera I have seen to date!!!!!!

name: Manuela T.
text: So disapointed! Everywhere in the internet is marked that there is a Google Store (similar to Apple) but no, here is absolutely nothing for public - even the water in the public toilet did not work. My family just told me to sell my android …

name: Abby Finton
text: MAKE TURNING OFF AI AN OPTION or we’re all moving back to a different browser id take yahoo over this annoying update. Either get rid of the ai because it’s always wrong anyways, or LET US TURN IT OFF

name: Dale Hulst
text: Google's poor implementation of Google TV and removing access to Youtube Kids via the Childs account is another glaring oversight by this company.  Not good enough.

name: van nguyen
text: Worst customer service EVER. Hands down. They make Comcast look like Angels. To this day, I still have not received the help I needed from them.

name: Shreez
text:
It is the headquarters of Google.

Which is helping me right now to write this review. …

name: Kate Shao
text: Love this company! Even though visitors cannot enter their office, but you can enjoy the awesome and beautiful outdoor area. It's pretty cool that sometimes you also can see some employees do exercise in the area.

name: Ishwor Bhusal
text:
A different world, completely unique experience, place where someone doesn't like to come out after entering into the campus.
Good Headquarters, Mountain View (Silicon Valley), California, United States of America

name: Okan S
text: Amazing and welcoming google complex in Silicon Valley. It is open to public. You can take a colourful google bike for free and take a tour in the campus. You can feel the philosophy of google in the campus which encourages its employees to …

name: Alam Shaikh
text:
What a superb campus, the towers are named after years which seems a cool idea.
The whole campus is clean and googles finds their way with beautiful small small gardens. …

name: Carla Benavides
text:
Horrible treatment. Person at googleplex out of the blue told me: HEY MA’AM - YOU CANNOT GO INTO ANY BUILDING.
Then I asked, can I use the bikes to explore around? …

name: Bienvenida nguema
text: I have a business account with Google and it is supposed to be inactive, how is it possible an inactive account but I see the money go up every day in this same account who is going to pay it, I created a business account for my small …

name: Steven Gutierrez
text:
Fun corporate HQ to visit.

Set across lots of buildings and well prepared for tourists. …

name: Nia, Lens Go
text: Sprawling campus with lots of greenery and park like  atmosphere. Visitors can not enter but can spend time touring and enjoying the beautiful outdoor areas or watching the outdoor employee fitness classes. Friendly security staff. Love this company!

name: Gary Pugh
text: Someone is getting into my bank account from you.Better take care of it or it's going to get ugly there.

name: Goesto Restaurants
text: It's a beautiful place but you can't go in anywhere! I would have loved to grab some food, buy some merchandise, or whatever, but everything was closed to the public. …

name: Nicolas De Smyter
text: Very fun location to visit. There are a lot of different things to see here, but the most interesting thing here, is to talk to one of the Google'rs and ask what they have to say. Mainly because then you can here things about the Googleplez that is really interesting but isn't officially shared.

name: Henrike Scharnhorst
text: Cool to be able to say that you visited the Google Campus. But there isn’t really much to see if you don’t work there. The gift shop is quite okay if you like Google / Android.

name: Andras Herceg
text: I was only outside at the weekend. I couldn't skip the Android park:) At that time the Ice Cream Sandwich was the newest version. We took the Google-bus to the train, the driver was a nice helpful guy.

name: DJ H
text: Google is one of my favorite companies hands down. No other company has given so much control and free information at their fingertips. On a morning walk around my neighborhood, I saw a Google Street View vehicle. Therefore I decided to …
